results.title: Supply and drainage ditches
results.creator_credit: J.J. Walker and CSIRO. Film Unit
results.brief_description: Stresses the need for control of irrigation water by the design and construction of ditches capable of handling an adequate flow of water. Describes the design, lay-out and construction of an efficient irrigation system without which fertile land may be ruined by water logging and salting.

results.title: Supervising: developing co-operation
results.creator_credit: Caravel Films and United States. Dept. of the Navy
results.brief_description: Points out that the efficiency of an organisation depends on the morale of its personnel and then shows how office supervisors can help to foster a spirit of cooperation among civilian personnel. Right and wrong ways of supervision are demonstrated.

results.title: Supersonic
results.brief_description: In 1956 it had all begun, the sound barrier had been broken and a handful of men were thinking of making a passenger airline to break the sound barrier - to halve the world. In 1959, real work was begun on the idea. The French and the British consolidated to save time and money. In 1962 a model of the aircraft was shown at Farnsborough Air Show, and it was named “Concorde”. America became interested, and not wanting to be left behind, began designing their own sound breaking passenger aircraft. The race was on - neither of the parties wanting to make any mistakes, both very meticulous in their research. This documentary is mostly made up of interviews with the chief personnel (French, English and American) involved in designing, testing and investigating the construction of a supersonic aircraft. Commentary by Michael Flanders.

results.title: Superman and the bride
results.brief_description: Sets out to take a hard look at the main messages that come to us daily from the media, focusing on images of men and women. Does the mass media give us an accurate picture of the sexes or do they serve up a stereotype diet of sexy, passive females and tough, dynamic males? This atempts to answer these questions using satire, songs, cartoons and clips from film. Cast includes Julie Covington, Jane Meadows, Charlie Stafford. Narrated by Gavin Richards, Stephanie Turner.

results.title: Superb lyrebird
results.brief_description: This synchronised picture and sound record of the territorial calls and display of the lyrebird was produced to help the Division of Wildlife Research to correlate the bird’s throat and beak movements with the sound produced.

results.title: Super 8 soldiers
results.creator_credit: Mark Worth, Australia. Special Broadcasting Service and Kino Eye Pictures
results.brief_description: This unusual video explores the day-to-day life of Australian soldiers who served during the Vietnamese War. By using super-8 film footage that the soldiers took of themselves, we are taken from training in Australia to the camps in Vietnam where the young men were to confront the terrors of fighting a bitter guerrila war. The super-8 images are ultimately touching because they reveal young boys at the point of losing their innocence. The haunting musical score is by David Bridie and John Phillips of Not Drowning, Waving.
